text:
Our weekly newsletter is out! 💬

This week: EuropaBio's response to the revision of the #EU legislation on #children & #rarediseases medicines; #DSM & #TUDelft: an #ArtificialIntelligence Lab; #AstraZeneca & the authorisation of its #COVID19 #vaccine!
